Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is spotted with an off-white granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, South Magazine TA:32-33/2
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394027) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394027)
